rooms.description: A spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows that maximizes natural light and ventilation. It is wheelchair accessible with no steps and ample clearances.
Open dining space integrated with the living room. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side ensure ample natural light.
A private master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed for comfort and privacy, wheelchair accessible with accessible bathroom.
Second bedroom designed for extended family or guest use. Features floor-to-ceiling windows and a dedicated wardrobe area.

features.lighting: natural light supplemented with task lighting

rooms.description: Third bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows. It provides a blend of privacy and natural light.
Fourth bedroom, similarly designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for a bright and airy space.
Fifth bedroom offering ample space with floor-to-ceiling windows, ensuring consistent natural light and ventilation.
Sixth bedroom designed with accessibility in mind. Features floor-to-ceiling windows and a wheelchair-accessible bathroom.
A dedicated study area adjacent to the master bedroom. Designed with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and soundproofing for concentration.
Modern kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light. Designed for wheelchair accessibility with low counters and open layouts.
Wheelchair-accessible bathroom for master bedroom with non-slip floors and grab bars. Features floor-to-ceiling windows (if privacy permits) or frosted glass to maintain Vastu balance.
Secondary bathroom for family use. Designed with floor-to-ceiling windows and accessibility features.
Third bathroom for guest or family use. Maintains wheelchair accessibility with accessible fixtures.
Fourth bathroom for overall family convenience. Designed following Vastu principles with natural light and ventilation.
Fifth bathroom for ease of access. Maintains natural light and ventilation while being wheelchair accessible.
Sixth bathroom, ensuring that every bedroom has its own private space. Designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and wheelchair accessibility.
Central utility room with storage for cleaning supplies. Designed to be easily accessible and wheelchair friendly.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entry with a wide door, threshold-free design and automatic doors if possible. Complies with local norms and Vastu guidelines.
Secondary entry for service access, designed to be wheelchair accessible and secure.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern facade to maximize morning light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the western side, ensuring balanced natural light and ventilation throughout the day.
